Metadata.name: Delicate Music Tweaks
Metadata.author: Pixelguin, rudiger__gb
Metadata.description:
A small collection of faithful music enhancements for Persona 4 Golden.
Each change is carefully considered, justified, and tested before being added to the collection, making it suitable for both first-timers and longtime fans.
For a list of changes and explanations, visit https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VPda-tPrKipcLlP0AXuVeGVkxkOxP8gPN36w5_4jUCY/view
